name: The Darkest Night (ItsNotSimon, Ren3)
description:
Survive as long as you can, through the darkest night. Scavenge your surroundings for berries to eat, and firewood to keep the fire burning. Be wary of the darkness... ~ ~ ~ Notes (please read!)

- For the best experience, please download for Windows

- If you are playing on browser, please use Chrome (you may need to zoom out)

~ ~ ~ Made for the Lux Jam 1 in 2 days. Enjoy :3 ~ ~ ~

Link to the source code of the project, for those who wish to view it.
